00082         public final AbstractOrmEntity newE()
00083         {
00084                 if (getFields().getKeyList().contains(getPrimaryKeyName()))
00085                         setData(getPrimaryKeyName(), Orm.insert(this));
00086                 else
00087                         Orm.insert(this);
00088                 return this;
00089         }

00176         public BaseViewerData editUI(Hashtable<String, String> parameters,
00177                         boolean isReadOnly)
00178         {
00179                 PromptViewerData promptData = new PromptViewerData();
00180 
00181                 AbstractOrmEntity retEntity;
00182                 AbstractOrmEntity searchEntity;
00183                 try
00184                 {
00185                         searchEntity = this.getClass().newInstance();
00186                 } catch (InstantiationException e)
00187                 {
00188                         throw new RuntimeException(e);
00189                 } catch (IllegalAccessException e)
00190                 {
00191                         throw new RuntimeException(e);
00192                 }
00193                 if (getPrimaryKeyValue() != 0)
00194                 {
00195                         String primaryKeyName = getPrimaryKeyName();
00196                         Integer primaryKeyValue = getPrimaryKeyValue();
00197                         searchEntity.setData(primaryKeyName, primaryKeyValue);
00198 
00199                         // il ne peu y avoir plus d'une entity (search par primaryKey)
00200                         Vector<AbstractOrmEntity> result = get(searchEntity);
00201                         retEntity = result.get(0);
00202                 }
00203                 else
00204                 {
00205                         retEntity = this;
00206                 }
00207                 retEntity.setCurrentAction(new BaseAction("Edit", this));
00208 
00209                 if (parameters != null && parameters.containsKey("submit")
00210                                 && !fields.isErrorState() && !isReadOnly)
00211                 {
00212                         if (getPrimaryKeyValue() == 0)
00213                         {
00214                                 newE();
00215                         }
00216                         else
00217                         {
00218                                 edit(getPrimaryKeyName() + "='" + getPrimaryKeyValue() + "'");
00219                         }
00220 
00221                         FlagPoolManager.applyFlagPoolChanges(this,
00222                                         getPositiveFlagPoolList().values(), parameters);
00223 
00224                         retEntity = (AbstractOrmEntity) ((PromptViewerData) editUI(
00225                                         new Hashtable<String, String>(), isReadOnly)).getData();
00226                         promptData.addNormalMessage("Changements accomplis");
00227                 }
00228 
00229                 // On doit ajouter les paramètres spécifiés par défaut lors de la
00230                 // création de l'entité.
00231                 if (parameters != null)
00232                         for (String key : getFields().getKeyList())
00233                                 if (parameters.get(key) != null)
00234                                         setData(key, parameters.get(key));
00235 
00236                 promptData.setData(retEntity);
00237                 promptData.setButtonAction(new ActionLink("Enregistrer",
00238                                 new BaseAction("Edit", this)));
00239                 promptData.setBackLink(new ActionLink("Voir Liste", new BaseAction(
00240                                 "GetList", this)));
00241                 promptData.setTitle(retEntity.getVisibleName());
00242                 for (Field<?> fld : getFields())
00243                 {
00244                         promptData.addAlertMessage(fld.getErrorMessage());
00245                 }
00246 
00247                 promptData.setReadOnly(isReadOnly);
00248 
00249                 return promptData;
00250         }

00332         public ListViewerData getList(Hashtable<String, String> parameters)
00333 
00334         {
00335                 Vector<AbstractOrmEntity> resultSet;
00336                 AbstractOrmEntity searchEntity;
00337                 try
00338                 {
00339                         searchEntity = this.getClass().newInstance();
00340                 } catch (InstantiationException e)
00341                 {
00342                         throw new RuntimeException(e);
00343                 } catch (IllegalAccessException e)
00344                 {
00345                         throw new RuntimeException(e);
00346                 }
00347                 ListViewerData entityList = new ListViewerData(searchEntity);
00348                 String searchEntry = parameters.get("searchEntry");
00349                 String orderBy = parameters.get("orderBy");
00350                 Vector<String> searchParameters = null;
00351 
00352                 int limit = ListViewerData.BuildLimit(parameters,
00353                                 getItemLimitListPerPage());
00354 
00355                 int offset = ListViewerData.BuildOffset(parameters, limit);
00356 
00357                 // On ajoute les critères de recherche de la barre de recherche
00358                 if (searchEntry != null && searchEntry.length() > 0
00359                                 && !searchEntry.equals("null"))
00360                 {
00361                         searchParameters = new Vector<String>();
00362                         String currentParameter;
00363                         for (Field<?> field : getFields())
00364                         {
00365                                 currentParameter = field.getShortName() + " like '%"
00366                                                 + searchEntry + "%'";
00367                                 if (searchParameters.size() > 0)
00368                                         currentParameter = "or " + currentParameter;
00369                                 searchParameters.add(currentParameter);
00370                         }
00371                 }
00372 
00373                 for (String fieldName : searchEntity.getFields().getKeyList())
00374                 {
00375                         if (searchParameters == null)
00376                                 searchParameters = new Vector<String>();
00377                         String currentParameter;
00378                         if (parameters.containsKey(fieldName)
00379                                         && !parameters.get(fieldName).equals("&"))
00380 
00381                         {
00382                                 currentParameter = fieldName + " = "
00383                                                 + parameters.get(fieldName);
00384                                 searchParameters.add(currentParameter);
00385                         }
00386                 }
00387                 if (searchParameters != null && searchParameters.size() == 0)
00388                         searchParameters = null;
00389 
00390                 resultSet = Orm.select(searchEntity, searchParameters, limit, offset,
00391                                 orderBy);
00392                 // todo: correct deprecate
00393                 int totalRowCount = Orm.count(searchEntity, searchParameters);
00394                 if (limit < totalRowCount)
00395                         entityList.setPageSelector(new PageSelector(limit, offset,
00396                                         totalRowCount, "/" + getCurrentModule().getSystemName()
00397                                                         + "/GetList/" + getSystemName(), searchEntry,
00398                                         orderBy));
00399                 else
00400                         entityList.setPageSelector(null);
00401 
00402                 entityList.setSearchBar(new SearchBar("/"
00403                                 + getCurrentModule().getSystemName() + "/GetList/"
00404                                 + getSystemName(), parameters.get("searchEntry"), this,
00405                                 orderBy, limit, offset));
00406 
00407                 for (AbstractOrmEntity entity : resultSet)
00408                         entityList.addEntity(entity);
00409 
00410                 entityList.setCurrentModule(getCurrentModule());
00411                 entityList.setTitle(getVisibleName());
00412                 entityList.addGlobalActions(new ActionLink("Nouveau "
00413                                 + getVisibleName(), new BaseAction("New", this)));
00414 
00415                 // ajout des action specifique
00416                 ActionLink specAction = new ActionLink("Modifier", new BaseAction(
00417                                 "Edit", this));
00418                 specAction.addParameters(getPrimaryKeyName(), "&");
00419                 entityList.addSpecificActionButtonList(specAction);
00420 
00421                 specAction = new ActionLink("Effacer", new BaseAction("Delete", this));
00422                 specAction.addParameters(getPrimaryKeyName(), "&");
00423                 specAction.setConfirm(true);
00424                 entityList.addSpecificActionButtonList(specAction);
00425 
00426                 return entityList;
00427         }

00433         {

00440         @Override
00441         public Module getCurrentModule()
00442         {
00443                 if (currentModule == null)
00444                 {
00445                         String fullClassName = getClass().getName();
00446 
00447                         int firstDot = fullClassName.indexOf('.');
00448                         int secondDot = fullClassName.indexOf('.', firstDot + 1);
00449 
00450                         String modulePackageName = fullClassName.substring(firstDot + 1,
00451                                         secondDot);
00452 
00453                         String moduleName = ("" + modulePackageName.charAt(0))
00454                                         .toUpperCase() + modulePackageName.substring(1);
00455 
00456                         return ListModule.getModule(moduleName);
00457                 }
00458 
00459                 return currentModule;
00460         }

00548         public final Integer getPrimaryKeyValue()
00549         {
00550                 String primaryKeyName = getPrimaryKeyName();
00551                 Fields fieldsList = getFields();
00552                 Field<?> field = fieldsList.getField(primaryKeyName);
00553 
00554                 if (field == null || field.getData() == null)
00555                         return null;
00556 
00557                 int value = (Integer) field.getData();
00558 
00559                 return value;
00560         }

00597         public Vector<String> getNaturalKeyNameList()
00598 
00599         {
00600                 Vector<String> naturalKeyNameList = new Vector<String>();
00601 
00602                 for (Field<?> field : getFields())
00603                         if (field.isNaturalKey())
00604                                 naturalKeyNameList.add(field.getShortName());
00605 
00606                 if (naturalKeyNameList.size() < 1) // 1er Comportement par default si
00607                         // clef
00608                         // naturelle vide
00609                         for (Field<?> field : getFields())
00610                                 if (field.getShortName().toLowerCase().contains("name"))
00611                                         naturalKeyNameList.add(field.getShortName());
00612 
00613                 if (naturalKeyNameList.size() < 1) // 2er Comportement par default si
00614                         // clef
00615                         // naturelle vide
00616                         for (Field<?> field : getFields())
00617                                 if (field.getShortName().toLowerCase().contains("nom"))
00618                                         naturalKeyNameList.add(field.getShortName());
00619 
00620                 if (naturalKeyNameList.size() < 1) // 3e Comportement par default si
00621                         // clef
00622                         // naturelle vide
00623                         for (Field<?> field : getFields())
00624                                 if (!field.getShortName().equals(getPrimaryKeyName()))
00625                                         naturalKeyNameList.add(field.getShortName());
00626 
00627                 if (naturalKeyNameList.size() < 1)// 4e Comportement par default si clef
00628                         // naturelle vide
00629                         naturalKeyNameList.add(getPrimaryKeyName());
00630 
00631                 return naturalKeyNameList;
00632         }
00633 
00637         public String getNaturalKeyDescription()
00638         {
00639                 String description = "";
00640                 String currentFieldValue;
00641                 for (String naturalKeyName : getNaturalKeyNameList())
00642                 {
00643 
00644                         if (getFields().containsFieldName(naturalKeyName))
00645                         {
00646                                 currentFieldValue = getDataString(naturalKeyName);
00647 
00648                                 if (getFields().getField(naturalKeyName) instanceof FieldCurrency)
00649                                         currentFieldValue = MoneyViewer
00650                                                         .getHtmlCode(currentFieldValue);
00651 
00652                                 ListOfValue listOfValue = tryMatchListOfValue(naturalKeyName);
00653                                 if (listOfValue == null)
00654                                 {
00655                                         description += " " + currentFieldValue;
00656                                 }
00657                                 else
00658                                 {
00659                                         description += " "
00660                                                         + listOfValue.getForeignValue(currentFieldValue);
00661                                 }
00662                         }
00663                         else
00664                         {
00665                                 description += " -";
00666                         }
00667 
00668                 }
00669 
00670                 return description.trim();
00671         }
00672 
00676         public String getNaturalKeyName()
00677         {
00678                 String name = getVisibleName();
00679                 for (String naturalKeyName : getNaturalKeyNameList())
00680                         name += " " + getFields().getField(naturalKeyName).getName();
00681 
00682                 return name.trim();
00683         }

00779         public PluralAccessor getPluralAccessor(String accessorName,
00780                         AbstractOrmEntity searchCriteriaEntity)
00781         {
00782                 PluralAccessor pluralAccessor = PluralAccessorManager
00783                                 .getPluralAccessor(this, accessorName, searchCriteriaEntity);
00784 
00785                 if (pluralAccessor != null)
00786                         return pluralAccessor;
00787 
00788                 PluralAccessor uncleanedList = getPluralAccessor(accessorName);
00789                 PluralAccessor cleanList = new PluralAccessor(
00790                                 uncleanedList.getInternalEntityDefinition());
00791 
00792                 for (AbstractOrmEntity entityFromList : uncleanedList)
00793                         if (entityFromList.matchesCriteriasFrom(searchCriteriaEntity))
00794                                 cleanList.add(entityFromList);
00795 
00796                 return cleanList;
00797         }
00798 
00799         private boolean matchesCriteriasFrom(AbstractOrmEntity searchCriteriaEntity)
00800         {
00801                 String fieldValue, fieldValueToMatch;
00802                 for (Field<?> field : searchCriteriaEntity.getFields())
00803                 {
00804                         fieldValue = getDataString(field.getShortName());
00805                         fieldValueToMatch = field.getDataString();
00806 
00807                         if (fieldValueToMatch != null && !fieldValueToMatch.equals("null")
00808                                         && !fieldValueToMatch.equals(fieldValue))
00809                         {
00810                                 return false;
00811                         }
00812                 }
00813                 return true;
00814         }
00815 
00819         public void assign(AbstractOrmEntity foreignEntity)
00820         {
00821                 String foreignEntityForeignKeyName = foreignEntity.getForeignKeyName();
00822                 String localEntityForeignKeyName = getForeignKeyName();
00823 
00824                 if (getFields().containsFieldName(foreignEntityForeignKeyName))
00825                 {
00826                         setData(foreignEntityForeignKeyName,
00827                                         foreignEntity.getPrimaryKeyValue());
00828                 }
00829                 else if (foreignEntity.getFields().containsFieldName(
00830                                 localEntityForeignKeyName))
00831                 {
00832                         foreignEntity.setData(localEntityForeignKeyName,
00833                                         getPrimaryKeyValue());
00834                 }
00835                 else
00836                 {
00837                         throw new RuntimeException("Impossible d'assigner "
00838                                         + getNaturalKeyName() + " à "
00839                                         + foreignEntity.getNaturalKeyName());
00840                 }
00841         }

00845         public void save()
00846         {
00847                 if (getPrimaryKeyValue() == null)
00848                         throw new RuntimeException(
00849                                         "Aucune valeur de clef primaire disponible");
00850 
00851                 edit(getPrimaryKeyName() + "='" + getPrimaryKeyValue() + "'");
00852         }
